FuncDef:
The nat alarm vsu-service-fault disable command disables the service fault log or alarm function of a board.
The undo nat alarm vsu-service-fault disable command restores the service fault log or alarm function of a board.
By default, the alarm and log functions are enabled for service faults on a board.
CLIs: nat alarm vsu-service-fault { distributed-user-online-fail | centralized-user-online-fail | first-packet-attack } { log | trap } disable
nat alarm vsu-service-fault alg-resource-exhaust { log | trap } disable
undo nat alarm vsu-service-fault { distributed-user-online-fail | centralized-user-online-fail | first-packet-attack } { log | trap } disable
undo nat alarm vsu-service-fault alg-resource-exhaust { log | trap } disable

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that a distributed user fails to go online continuously. This parameter takes effect only on a VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S.
-

Indicates an alarm that is generated when centralized users fail to go online. This parameter takes effect only on a VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S.
-

Indicates the first packet attack alarm. This parameter takes effect only on a VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S.
-

Indicates the ALG resource exhaustion alarm.
-

Examples: [~HUAWEI] nat alarm vsu-service-fault alg-resource-exhaust trap disable
[~HUAWEI] nat alarm vsu-service-fault distributed-user-online-fail trap disable
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
By configuring the board service alarm function on service board, you can determine whether to send alarms and logs when a service board fails. Check whether alarm clearance and logs are sent after the service fault is rectified.
The nat alarm vsu-service-fault { distributed-user-online-fail | centralized-user-online-fail | first-packet-attack } { log | trap } disable command applies only to VSUF-80/VSUF-160/VSUI-160-E/VSUI-400/VSUI-400-E/VSUI-400A/VSUI-400A-E/VSUI-400-S/VSUI-400A-S service boards.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
